auth.register.name: Full Name
auth.register.agreeTermsError: You must agree to the terms of service

auth.forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
auth.forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to receive a password reset link
auth.forgotPassword.oneTimeUse: Link can only be used once
auth.forgotPassword.noteOneTime: Each link can only be used once
auth.forgotPassword.noteSpam: Check spam folder if you don't see the email
auth.forgotPassword.tipContent: Add our email to your contacts to avoid spam

auth.resetPassword.title: Reset Password
auth.resetPassword.subtitle: Create a new password for your account
auth.resetPassword.securityStrong: Use a strong password with at least 8 characters
auth.resetPassword.securityShare: Don't share your password with anyone
auth.resetPassword.securityAutoLogin: You will be automatically logged in after reset
auth.resetPassword.invalidLinkMessage: The password reset link is invalid or has expired
auth.resetPassword.redirectMessage: You will be redirected to the homepage in 3 seconds...
